You Found Me

Now let me Introduce Myself

I'm Jacob. I build custom WordPress sites at Elegant Seagulls in Marquette, Michigan. With a keen eye for detail and a passion for quality assurance, I deliver products that adapt to all modern screen sizes and browsers.

You can view some of my current and past open source projects on GitHub. If you're feeling friendly, give me a follow on Twitter.
